front.title: Secure UAS Network RID and C2 Transport

abstract.t: This document defines a transport mechanism for Unmanned Aircraft System (UAS) Network Remote ID (Net-RID). The Broadcast Remote ID (B-RID) messages can be sent directly over UDP or via a more functional protocol using CoAP/CBOR for the Net-RID messaging. This is secured via either HIP/ESP or DTLS. HIP/ESP or DTLS secure messaging Command-and-Control (C2) for is also described.
